== Overview ==\n[[lomdiff]] is a vocabulary of [[lom#Difficulty|lom:Difficulty]]&rarr;[[lom#difficulty|lom:difficulty]]&rarr;... values from [[LOM]] schema\n\n== Prefix ==\n\nlomdiff : http://purl.org/lom/voc/Difficulty/\n\n== Values ==\n* <span id='very easy'>very easy</span> -\n* <span id='easy'>easy</span> -\n* <span id='medium'>medium</span> -\n* <span id='difficult'>difficult</span> -\n* <span id='very difficult'>very difficult</span> -
